title: Project Zomboid (Early Access v32.7)
description:
== About the game:
Project Zomboid is an open-ended zombie-infested sandbox. It asks one simple question Ã¢â‚¬â€œ how will you die? 

In the towns of Muldraugh and West Point, survivors must loot houses, build defences and do their utmost to delay their inevitable death day by day. No help is coming Ã¢â‚¬â€œ their continued survival relies on their own cunning, luck and ability to evade a relentless horde. 


== Features:CURRENT FEATURES:
Hardcore Sandbox Zombie Survival 
Game with a focus on realistic survival. 
Online multiplayer survival with persistent player run servers. 
Hundreds of zombies with swarm mechanics and in-depth visual and hearing systems. 
Full line of sight system and real-time lighting, sound and visibility mechanics. Hide in the shadows, keep quiet and keep the lights off at night, or at least hang sheets over the windows. 
Vast and growing map (loosely based on a real world location) for you to explore, loot and set up your fortress. Check out BlindcoderÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s map project: http://pzmap.crash-override.net/ 
Use tools and items to craft weapons, barricade and cook. You can even build zombie proof forts by chopping trees, sawing wood and scavenging supplies. 
Deal with depression, boredom, hunger, thirst and illness while trying to survive. 
Day turns to night. The electricity falters. Hordes migrate. Winter draws in. Nature gradually starts to take over. 
Farming, trapping, fishing, carpentry, cooking, trapping, character customization, skills and perks that develop based on what you do in-game. 
Proper zombies that donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t run. (Unless you tell them to in the sandbox menu). 
A ton of amazing atmospheric music tracks by the prodigy that is Zach Beever. 
Imaginative Challenge scenarios and instant action Ã¢â‚¬ËœLast StandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ mode, on top of regular Sandbox and Survival 
Full, open and powerful Lua modding support. 
Gamepad support 
Local 4 player split-screen co-op

PLANNED FEATURES:
The return of our PZ Stories mode that also serves as first ever tutorial actively trying to kill you at every turn. Kate and Baldspot return! 
In-depth and varied NPC encounters driven in a persistent world, powered by a metagame system that turns each play-through into your very own zombie survival movie with emergent narrative gameplay. 
Constant expansion of the countryside and cities around Muldraugh and West Point 
Full wilderness survival systems, animals and hunting for food. 
More items, crafting recipes, weapons and gameplay systems. 
Steam Workshop and Achievements support


== Version:
Project Zomboid Early Access build 32.7, from June 19, 2015 FULL game
Updated by LuKeStorm


== Instructions:
Extract anywhere (7Zip - link below) 
Launch ProjectZomboid32.exe or ProjectZomboid64.exe depending on your system
Play - Enjoy - Seed!


= System Requirements:
CPU: Intel 2.77GHz Dual Core 
GPU: OpenGL 2.1 compatible dedicated graphics card 
OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 
HDD: 1.3 GB available space
RAM: 2 GB



             If you enjoyed the game then share with others by seeding!
                       Remember to support quality games.

Game made by 
The Indie Stone
